citations.desc: ATTENDING VETERINARIAN AND ADEQUATE VETERINARY CARE (DEALERS AND EXHIBITORS).
citations.narrative:
Licensee has a new attending veterinarian. A current written program of veterinary care must be completed, and
approved by the licensee and the attending veterinarian.
CORRECT BY 6-15-14

- Sheep pen: Wire mesh is torn, and has bent ends, extending into animal area.
- Goat pen: Bent and torn chicken wire is present around a dead tree in the animal area.
- Pig pen: A loose board is present, with nails exposed (above the level of the animals).
- Nubian goat pen: Wire mesh is torn, and has bent ends, extending into animal area.
A program must be in place to ensure that enclosures are structurally sound and maintained in good repair, to
contain the animals and to protect the animals from injury.
CORRECT BY: 6-15-14

Stall areas have numerous flies present, including on animals. A program of pest control must be established and
maintained. No fly control measures currrently in place.
CORRECT BY: 5-25-14
Exit interview conducted with facility personnel.

narrative:
2.40(a)(1)
ATTENDING VETERINARIAN AND ADEQUATE VETERINARY CARE (DEALERS AND EXHIBITORS).
Licensee has a new attending veterinarian. A current written program of veterinary care must be completed, and
approved by the licensee and the attending veterinarian.
CORRECT BY 6-15-14
3.125(a)
FACILITIES, GENERAL.   
- Sheep pen: Wire mesh is torn, and has bent ends, extending into animal area. 
- Goat pen: Bent and torn chicken wire is present around a dead tree in the animal area. 
- Pig pen: A loose board is present, with nails exposed (above the level of the animals).
- Nubian goat pen: Wire mesh is torn, and has bent ends, extending into animal area. 
A program must be in place to ensure that enclosures are structurally sound and maintained in good repair, to
contain the animals and to protect the animals from injury. 
CORRECT BY: 6-15-14
3.131(d)
SANITATION.   
Stall areas have numerous flies present, including on animals. A program of pest control must be established and
maintained. No fly control measures currrently in place.
CORRECT BY: 5-25-14
Exit interview conducted with facility personnel.

species.common: DOMESTIC PIG / POTBELLY PIG / MICRO PIG
